title: ArtFeed Featuring In a Cloud, in a Wall, in a Chair
title_display: ArtFeed Featuring In a Cloud, in a Wall, in a Chair
short_description: Enjoy an artful brunch hosted by the Evening Associates. Sip on a "Bloody Maria" while learning more about In a Cloud, in a Wall, in a Chair: Six Modernists in Mexico at Midcentury, the first exhibition to explore Mexico’s impact on the visionary artists and designers Clara Porset, Lola Álvarez Bravo, Anni Albers, Ruth Asawa, Cynthia Sargent, and Sheila Hicks. Then visit the exhibition.
description:
Enjoy an artful brunch hosted by the Evening Associates. Sip on a "Bloody Maria" while learning more about In a Cloud, in a Wall, in a Chair: Six Modernists in Mexico at Midcentury, the first exhibition to explore Mexico’s impact on the visionary artists and designers Clara Porset, Lola Álvarez Bravo, Anni Albers, Ruth Asawa, Cynthia Sargent, and Sheila Hicks. Then visit the exhibition.

Attendees must be 21+. This event is hosted by the Evening Associates. Please use the Modern Wing entrance at 159 East Monroe Street.

#ArtFeedChi @ArtInstitueEA
buy_button_caption:
$30 Evening Associates, $35 members and students, $45 nonmembers
Tickets available soon.
